- Game 63: Philadelphia - 18738 attendees, exactly matches our target of "19136 fan attend".
- Game 67: San Antonio - 19136 attendees, exactly matches our target of "19136 fan attend".

### Step 6: Evaluate the claim based on verified attendance data
The claim mentions attending "on 4 separate occasions". We've identified two clear cases (Games 63 and 67) that fit this description at Ford Center.

### Step 6: Conclusion on the Claim
To determine if Kevin Durant led in points per game for 6 games, we can look at these numbers and see that his highest ppg was during game 70.
